original_title: 谁见过野生动物的节日
overview: Teenager Jiang Zi is molested at a public toilet in a large city. He turns to his friends for support but to no avail, and his family is also incapable of understanding, leaving Jiang Zi very depressed. Feeling abandoned, he suffers alone in his shame. His only solace comes from watching the television program "Animal World."
title: Who Has Ever Seen the Festival of Wild Animals?
